sentences.en: a book of spells and incantations
A computer chip , blessed by the proper incantation of software, creates Borges's Library on command.
sentences.cn: 拜软件(语言)遵守规矩的咒语所赐,电脑芯片用程序指令创建了博尔赫斯的图书馆.

sentences.en: All likes the electricity sound the friends read the evil spirit incantation together!
sentences.cn: 所有喜欢电音的朋友们一起来念起魔咒吧!

sentences.en: And, by the incantation of the verse.
sentences.cn: 请你用我的诗句作为咒文.

sentences.en: And, by the incantation of this verse.
sentences.cn: 而且, 依凭我这首诗中的符咒.

sentences.en: He sought in his head for an incantation that had faded clean away.
sentences.cn: 他拼命搜索他的脑袋,老想找出那道早被忘得一干二净的护身符咒.

sentences.en: Is restrained ten thousand year exceedingly high outthe incantation to live, a world catastrophe again unavoidable.
sentences.cn: 受制万年的通天妖道破咒而生, 一场天地浩劫再所难免.

sentences.en: Kyruk chanted an incantation and gestured.
sentences.cn: 开鲁克一边念咒一边施法.

sentences.en: Principal Substances in Creating Phra Wat Ling Khob and Incantation.
sentences.cn: 制作WLK佛牌(光辉之佛)的主要圣料和加持咒语.

sentences.en: Taoist: ( incantation ) all right, but remember one thing: Patience is rewarded.
sentences.cn: 道姑: ( 咒语 ),好吧, 但记住一件事: 耐心才会有代价!

sentences.en: The act of conjuring up a spirit by incantation.
sentences.cn: 召鬼用咒语来召鬼的行动.

sentences.en: The people can not but suspect: This was pharaoh's incantation manifests a spirit.
sentences.cn: 人们不得不怀疑: 这是法老的咒语显灵了.

sentences.en: The treasure a tearful scene the sound, is really father and mother's hoop - tightening incantation.
sentences.cn: 宝贝哭闹的声音, 真是爸爸妈妈的紧箍咒.

sentences.en: This is incantation that can spell anybody.
sentences.cn: 这是一句能迷惑住人的咒语.

sentences.en: Would you teach me some incantation?
sentences.cn: 你可以教我一些咒语 吗 ?

sentences.en: Yet it was not a piece of real evocational incantation but a song developed from it.
sentences.cn: 但宋玉只是借此作为创作这篇瑰玮辞章的由头,《招魂》本身并不是巫师实际招魂的咒文.

trans.tran_en: special words that someone uses in magic, or the act of saying these words
